title: Espana Viva. Eps. 1-8
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Spain - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: An instructional video course for beginners that introduces Spanish for everyday situations. Each 25 minute episode consists of simple conversations that illustrate the basic language, followed by a short film reporting on different aspects of local life. Ep. 1: "Greeting people", ep.2: "Ordering drinks and introducing people", ep.3: "Buying food", ep.4: "Asking directions and where people live", ep.5: "Do you like...? and do you speak..?", ep.6: "Buying petrol and snacks", ep.7: "What is your profession? and telling the time", ep.8: "Eating out in Spain".
